requirements.description: Customer will make all disclosures to, and procure all necessary consents and authorizations from, Customer's users
as are reasonably necessary or appropriate for RevenueCat's performance of the Services
including without limitation: (i) RevenueCat's and Stripe's processing of personally identifiable information relating to such users
including, without limitation, by disclosing RevenueCat's and Stripe's processing of such information in Customer's privacy policy in a reasonable and industry-standard manner
